_sText:
It appears that I only make maps when I'm bored and have absolutely nothing to do..
Another small map, 6 spawn points for each team. The map is best played with 3 players on each team, also it has a full nav. file so you can play it with bots (they do however love to camp near the spawn points) no radar image though, I still don't know how to do that... I tryed using cubemaps so you won't really see any shadows I think, though the map looks nice and shiny. The screenshots don't show the map's shiny, clean look.

Can't find any bugs, if you do find any, post a comment or just send me a message.

Any sugestions about improvements, critics and "you suck" comments are welcome, I'm here to learn so, go ahead. If I think there are a few changes needed to be done, I'll try to improve the map. Don't forget to rate ;)

I don't feel like talking too much so that's about it. 

PS: The map has a little easter egg, have fun.

[] Nemus Monachus
